title: Online-Food-Ordering
description: The JKS Foods and Restaurant web app offers a seamless online food ordering experience with real-time updates, secure payments, and user-friendly features.

title: Calculator
description: A calculator web app providing basic mathematical operations with a clean, user-friendly interface for quick and accurate calculations.

title: Analog Clock
description: An analog clock web app that displays the current time with a real-time moving hour, minute, and second hand interface.

title: Train-Status
description: A train status app showing real-time train details like number, name, origin, and destination.

title: PortFolio
description: My portfolio showcases my best work, highlighting my skills and projects in web development and design.

title: ToDo-List Application
description: A To-Do List application helps users manage and track tasks efficiently for better productivity.

title: User-Authentication Application
description: User authentication is the process of verifying a user's identity using credentials like email, username, password, or OTP to grant secure access to an application.
